tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık müziğin bile seni dinlemesidir.
tr_quotes.author: Özdemir Asaf

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik seslerin mimarisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Madame de Stael

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik hayatın neşesi ruhu sevince ve her şeyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik duygularımızın en açık dilidir.
tr_quotes.author: Emil Zeig

tr_quotes.quote: En tatlı şarkılar en acı duyguları dile getirenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: P. B. Shelley

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik insanlığın ortak dilidir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Wadsvorth Longfellow

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik en tehlikeli hayvanı bile durduracak güçtedir.
tr_quotes.author: James Bramston

tr_quotes.quote: Müziğin ruhunu aşktan başka bir şeyle anlatamam.
tr_quotes.author: R. Wagner

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya sahnesinde işler sarpa sarınca orkestra devreye girer.
tr_quotes.author: Kari Kraus

tr_quotes.quote: Bir milleti tutsak etmek isterseniz müziğini çürütün.
tr_quotes.author: Confucius

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ülkenin türkülerini yapanlar kanunlarını yapanlardan daha değerlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Thales

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik insan ruhunu dalgalandıran okşayan ve ona ince zevkler tattıran üstün bir sanattır.
tr_quotes.author: Hugo Riman

tr_quotes.quote: Müziği kim anarsa başka insanların uğradığı tüm çöküntülerden kurtulur.
tr_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

tr_quotes.quote: Musiki zaman ve makam içine alınarak medenileştirilmiş yabani seslerden başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik erkeklerin kalbini alevlendirmeli kadınların ise gözünü yaşartmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

tr_quotes.quote: Müziğin amacı heyecandır hiçbir sanat insan kalbinde bu kadar yüce bir insanlık duygusu uyandıramaz.
tr_quotes.author: George Sand

tr_quotes.quote: Bir memleketin ahlak bakımından nasıl idare edildiğini anlamak isterseniz o ülkenin müziğini inceleyiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Confucius

tr_quotes.quote: Genellikle kokularda hatıralar uyandırma gücü olduğu söylenir müzik ve şarkı da aynı şekilde bu yönde etki eder.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Ağır ağır ölüyor yolculuğa çıkmayanlar okumayanlar müzik dinlemeyenler gönlünde incelik barındırmayanlar.
tr_quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan her gün bir parça müzik dinlemeli iyi bir şiir okumalı güzel bir tablo görmeli ve mümkünse birkaç mantıklı cümle söylemelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik doğruca ruha seslenir ruh da kendisini ancak müzik yardımıyla en iyi şekilde anlatabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Müziğin vahşi hayvanları yatıştıracak kayaları yumuşatacak ve yüzyıllık çınarları eğecek bir çekiciliği vardır.
tr_quotes.author: William Congreve

tr_quotes.quote: Bir senfonidir hayat. Uzun ya da kısa... Her bir notası, her bir ölçüsü ruhumuza batıp kalan ve derinden sızlatan bir hüznün resmi geçidi...
tr_quotes.author: Esin Deniz

tr_quotes.quote: Sanki hiç bitmesini istemediğin müziğin son notaları ol gözümde...
tr_quotes.author: Elif Bahar

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik, ruhu kelimelerden daha etkili binlerce şeyle doldurur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Biliyoruz ki; bazı sesler, bazı sahneler, bazı renkler ya da cümleler, insanın aklına mıh gibi çakılıp kalıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Hasan Ali Toptaş

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şaşkınlık şarkısı olarak besteliyorum aşkı: kaprisli notalar, huysuz sololarla.
tr_quotes.author: Didem Madak

tr_quotes.quote: Her şey birbirine girecek sıkılıp gidersen. Sesler biter, notalar devrilir, çalgılar susar; felaket olur.
tr_quotes.author: Vedat Türkali

tr_quotes.quote: Saz çalmayan tel, kadrini ne bilir.
tr_quotes.author: Karacaoğlan

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik. Ey acıların tatlı ve iyileştirici merhemi.
tr_quotes.author: Horace

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik, gökle toprak arasında bir ahenktir.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik, insanlığın hizmetine verilmiş çok büyük bir ödüldür.
tr_quotes.author: George Crumb

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik; zaman ve ezgilere uyarlanmış vahşi seslerden başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Müziğin olduğu yerde, kötülük barınmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Bir memleketin ahlak bakımından nasıl idare edildiğini anlamak isterseniz, o ülkenin müziğini inceleyiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyus

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer insanların hayatına müzik ve sevgi aşılarsan onları tedavi edebilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Bob Marley

tr_quotes.quote: Müziğin cazibesi durmadan dolaşan hislerimizi bağlar ve mustarip ruhumuzu sükunete kavuşturur.
tr_quotes.author: Congreve

tr_quotes.quote: Kalpteki fazilet tohumları müzikle yeşerir.
tr_quotes.author: Luther

tr_quotes.quote: Müziği sevmeyene insan dememeli onu seven ancak yarım insandır; müzik yapansa tam insan.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik ruhun dilidir. O, çekişmeyi bitirir, huzur getiren yaşamın gizini açar.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

tr_quotes.quote: En tatlı şarkılar, en acı duyguları dile getirenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: P. B. Shelley

tr_quotes.quote: Daha üstünü olamaz. Müzik yoluyla Tanrı'ya yaklaşmak ve oradan insanlığa seslenmek.
tr_quotes.author: Beethoven

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik öğrencileri sımsıkı tutar, ses ve ölçüden kaçamazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Radyoyu ne zaman açarsanız açın, en sevdiğiniz şarkının hep son melodilerini duyarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Müşfik Kenter

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik; hayatın neşesi, ruhu, sevince ve her şeyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Musikinin ritminde bir sır saklıdır; eğer onu ifşa etseydim dünya alt üst olurdu.
tr_quotes.author: Şems-i Tebrizi

tr_quotes.quote: Bu dans edenler, müziği hissetmeyenlerce deli olarak düşünülür.
tr_quotes.author: George Carlin

tr_quotes.quote: Musiki öyle bir denizdir ki, ben paçaları sıvadım; ama hala içine giremedim.
tr_quotes.author: Dede Efendi

tr_quotes.quote: Müzisyenler yaptıkları müzik ile başkalarının müzik yeteneklerini baltalayamazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Platon

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik; insan ruhunun anlayabileceği yegâne dildir.
tr_quotes.author: Bennet

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik; erkeklerin yüreklerinde alev, kadınların gözlerinden yaş çıkarır.
tr_quotes.author: Beethoven

tr_quotes.quote: Müzik; ses bileşimleriyle heyecan uyandırmadır.
tr_quotes.author: Fetis

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen bir kahve yudumlayıp bir şarkı açarsın, susarsın ve o şarkı senin söylemek istediğin her şeyi söyler.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Müzikli bir yaşam güzel geçirilmiştir ve bu yüzden kendimi müziğe adadım.
tr_quotes.author: Pavorotti

tr_quotes.quote: Ne zaman ki dinlediğiniz şarkılar size O'nu hatırlatmaz; işte ancak o zaman hayattan bi tat alabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: İlhan Berk

tr_quotes.quote: Türk musıkisini Dünya'nın anlaması lâzımdır. Onu bütün dünyaya anlatabilmek için bizim milletçe bugünkü medeni dünyanın seviyesine yükselmemiz gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Müziğin vahşi hayvanları yatıştıracak, kayaları yumuşatacak ve yüzyıllık çınarları eğecek, bir çekiciliği vardır.
tr_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: Words make you think a thought. Music makes you feel a feeling. A song makes you feel a thought
en_quotes.author: E. Y. Harburg

en_quotes.quote: Like sunshine, music is a powerful force that can instantly and almost chemically change your entire mood
en_quotes.author: Michael Franti

en_quotes.quote: The true beauty of music is that it connects people. It carries a message, and we, the musicians, are the messengers
en_quotes.author: Roy Ayers

en_quotes.quote: Music was invented to confirm human loneliness
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

en_quotes.quote: Music fathoms the sky
en_quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

en_quotes.quote: Music - it's motivational and just makes you relax
en_quotes.author: Taika Waititi

en_quotes.quote: If I had a free afternoon, I would play music, sit in my backyard, and drink coffee
en_quotes.author: Aja Naomi King

en_quotes.quote: I need to listen to chill music when I'm driving. It prevents road rage
en_quotes.author: Aaron Paul

en_quotes.quote: There is geometry in the humming of the strings, there is music in the spacing of the spheres
en_quotes.author: Pythagoras

en_quotes.quote: As much as I love music, in my mind, photography is what makes me the happiest - that's for sure
en_quotes.author: Julian Lennon

en_quotes.quote: Music doesn't lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music
en_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

en_quotes.quote: I go with the flow. Whatever music you play for me, I'll dance
en_quotes.author: Gael Garcia Bernal

en_quotes.quote: I feel sexy when I'm natural. When I hear good music. When I feel sunlight on my skin
en_quotes.author: Lotte Verbeek

en_quotes.quote: Music really transcends languages, and it means so much
en_quotes.author: RM

en_quotes.quote: When I have downtime, music is a big part of my life. Not so much singing, but I play the guitar
en_quotes.author: KJ Apa

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy everything I do, from music to fashion or to watches - the lifestyle
en_quotes.author: J Balvin

en_quotes.quote: Music is really driving my whole life
en_quotes.author: Ariana Grande

en_quotes.quote: Dance music is an emotional journey. It's how well you can make people feel something that they haven't felt
en_quotes.author: Steve Aoki

en_quotes.quote: Old music used to mean something. There is none of that today
en_quotes.author: Ziggy Marley

en_quotes.quote: I'm just trying to be myself - make music how I make music
en_quotes.author: YoungBoy Never Broke Again

en_quotes.quote: Tones sound, and roar and storm about me until I have set them down in notes
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: Every song is like a painting
en_quotes.author: Dick Dale

en_quotes.quote: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: Good music will always be recognized in the end
en_quotes.author: Suga

en_quotes.quote: Every act, every deed of justice and mercy and benevolence, makes heavenly music in Heaven
en_quotes.author: Ellen G. White

en_quotes.quote: I suffer from deep depression, so my only release is music
en_quotes.author: Kevin Gates

en_quotes.quote: Music is art, and making watches is art, too
en_quotes.author: J Balvin

en_quotes.quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night
en_quotes.author: A. J. McLean

en_quotes.quote: I think music made me who I am. Music taught me what was gutter and what wasn't. Music taught me how to live
en_quotes.author: YoungBoy Never Broke Again

en_quotes.quote: Without music, life is a journey through a desert
en_quotes.author: Pat Conroy

en_quotes.quote: Music should strike fire from the heart of man, and bring tears from the eyes of woman
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: Music is the best way for me to say I love you
en_quotes.author: Mireille Mathieu

en_quotes.quote: There's nothing better than live music. It's raw energy, and raw energy feeds the soul
en_quotes.author: Dhani Jones

en_quotes.quote: Music comes to me more readily than words
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: You have the sun, you have the moon, you have the air that you breathe - and you have the Rolling Stones!
en_quotes.author: Keith Richards

en_quotes.quote: Mathematics is the music of reason
en_quotes.author: James Joseph Sylvester

en_quotes.quote: You can get to know me through my music
en_quotes.author: YoungBoy Never Broke Again

en_quotes.quote: I like playing heavy metal music and pretending I'm a vampire in front of the mirror
en_quotes.author: Luke Mably

en_quotes.quote: Cinematography is infinite in its possibilities... much more so than music or language
en_quotes.author: Conrad Hall

en_quotes.quote: Music evokes so many feelings in us, memories, nostalgia, things that are connected to our past
en_quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

en_quotes.quote: I'm a funny person, but I take my music seriously
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: It was my love for the guitar that first got me into music and singing
en_quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

en_quotes.quote: If music be the food of love, play on
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I'm working on my life story. I'm not decided if it's going to be a musical or a movie with music in it
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Strangely, I feel that I become increasingly reclusive in my normal life and more open and candid in my music
en_quotes.author: Mika

en_quotes.quote: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: One of the things I love about music is live performance
en_quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

en_quotes.quote: I think visually, and music videos spark my creativity
en_quotes.author: Jay Park

en_quotes.quote: If I make music and people hate it, you know, whatever. I'll die someday, and one day, they will too
en_quotes.author: Billie Eilish

en_quotes.quote: Music at times is more like perfume than mathematics
en_quotes.author: Gabriel Marcel

en_quotes.quote: The darkness, the loop of negative thoughts on repeat, clamours and interferes with the music I hear in my head
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: Music makes me cry
en_quotes.author: Lil Peep

en_quotes.quote: Music is the melody whose text is the world
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Where there is devotional music, God is always at hand with His gracious presence
en_quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

en_quotes.quote: No two people on earth are alike, and it's got to be that way in music or it isn't music
en_quotes.author: Billie Holiday

en_quotes.quote: To be a legend, we have to make a lot of right moves and great music
en_quotes.author: J Balvin

en_quotes.quote: Music is the first thing I didn't give up
en_quotes.author: Andy Hurley

en_quotes.quote: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: We're proud to be lifetime musicians and a band that lives like a band and loves the music and gives our lives to it
en_quotes.author: Zac Brown

en_quotes.quote: This land is your land and this land is my land, sure, but the world is run by those that never listen to music anyway
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: I write while listening to music, mostly because the world beyond my headphones is too chaotic
en_quotes.author: Dean Bakopoulos

en_quotes.quote: We're a rock n' roll band. We're more music and rock n' roll than politics
en_quotes.author: Gary Rossington

en_quotes.quote: Music is the most powerful thing on this earth, and it's hard to be angry when you are listening to music
en_quotes.author: Jerry Reed

en_quotes.quote: I love having music just to chill to and also to rev me up a bit
en_quotes.author: Alexander Hanson

en_quotes.quote: Swing is my favorite kind of music
en_quotes.author: George Strait

en_quotes.quote: I love a lot of different styles, but my heart belongs in electronic music
en_quotes.author: John Grant

en_quotes.quote: I mean, the genuine roots of culture is folk music
en_quotes.author: John Lydon

en_quotes.quote: Fog and one blue light is all I need in life at the club. Just a dark room and loud music. I'm into that
en_quotes.author: Kelela

en_quotes.quote: There are more love songs than anything else. If songs could make you do something we'd all love one another
en_quotes.author: Frank Zappa

en_quotes.quote: A 'scream' is always just that - a noise and not music
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: You shouldn't be in the music business if you're posing
en_quotes.author: Rod Stewart

en_quotes.quote: Citizens of India, Pakistan, and Kashmir need to come together and make music
en_quotes.author: Zubin Mehta

en_quotes.quote: My heart, which is so full to overflowing, has often been solaced and refreshed by music when sick and weary
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Beethoven can write music, thank God, but he can do nothing else on earth
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: Serious rap music puts me to sleep
en_quotes.author: Lil Yachty

en_quotes.quote: I've been making music for a while. And I could read about myself on the Internet for a while
en_quotes.author: Azealia Banks

en_quotes.quote: Music is the voice that tells us that the human race is greater than it knows
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life
en_quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

en_quotes.quote: When I was seven, I saw 'Sister Act 2,' and I fell in love with the performing aspect of music
en_quotes.author: Leah LaBelle

en_quotes.quote: A lot of music is mathematics. It's balance
en_quotes.author: Mel Brooks

en_quotes.quote: To me, John Lennon and Elvis Presley were punks, because they made music that evoked those emotions in people
en_quotes.author: Joey Ramone

en_quotes.quote: Live music is the cure for what ails ya
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven
en_quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

en_quotes.quote: Some people like the dark music I do. The dark music is my life; it isn't make believe
en_quotes.author: Tech N9ne

en_quotes.quote: Cocktail music is accepted as audible wallpaper
en_quotes.author: Alistair Cooke

en_quotes.quote: When people hear good music, it makes them homesick for something they never had, and never will have
en_quotes.author: E. W. Howe

en_quotes.quote: Music is all about wanting to be better at it
en_quotes.author: Geddy Lee

en_quotes.quote: The Arabic music I listen to is extremely edgy. Ironic, sarcastic, sensual, erotic
en_quotes.author: Yasmine Hamdan

en_quotes.quote: I love country music, always have and always will
en_quotes.author: Casey James

en_quotes.quote: Where words fail, music speaks
en_quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

en_quotes.quote: I love being on the beach - it's my favourite place. I can chill out, read, listen to music, play with my daughter
en_quotes.author: Geri Halliwell

en_quotes.quote: Music fills the infinite between two souls
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: English is like music. The English language is really fit for singing. The notes match the feelings, and it makes sense
en_quotes.author: Ken Watanabe

en_quotes.quote: My music is the spiritual expression of what I am - my faith, my knowledge, my being
en_quotes.author: John Coltrane

en_quotes.quote: Rap music is the only vital form of music introduced since punk rock
en_quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

en_quotes.quote: The aim and final end of all music should be none other than the glory of God and the refreshment of the soul
en_quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

en_quotes.quote: Hawaii is paradise. It sounds cheesy to say it, but there's music in the air there
en_quotes.author: Bruno Mars

en_quotes.quote: I love all kinds of art. I mean, I love sketching and acting and music
en_quotes.author: Amandla Stenberg

en_quotes.quote: As a child I wanted to be a ballerina, ice-cream van owner, wife of George Michael, a nun, and a music conductor
en_quotes.author: Erin O'Connor

en_quotes.quote: Good fashion is like rock music: all anarchy and revolt
en_quotes.author: Ann Demeulemeester

en_quotes.quote: All music is escapism for me, but I like the way that, on a good night, that sense of escapism can be shared
en_quotes.author: Jamie xx

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I feel like rap music is almost the key to stopping racism
en_quotes.author: Eminem

en_quotes.quote: You are the music while the music lasts
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: I would hope my legacy would be bringing smiles to faces. Happiness with my music
en_quotes.author: Janet Jackson

en_quotes.quote: I wanted to try a different way of making music. That's what made me try different things with my voice
en_quotes.author: YoungBoy Never Broke Again

en_quotes.quote: Music is for every single person that walks the planet
en_quotes.author: Robert Plant

en_quotes.quote: I get a thrill meeting kids who are into alternative music
en_quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

en_quotes.quote: I have a sweet tooth for song and music. This is my Polish sin
en_quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

en_quotes.quote: Music has an intrinsic meaning, which has always been mysterious to me
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: I was very confused with where my life was heading, but I knew that whatever I did, music was going to be involved
en_quotes.author: Khalid

en_quotes.quote: I was touched by the magic of music. My way to communicate was through my guitar and music
en_quotes.author: Juanes

en_quotes.quote: The opera is to music what a bawdy house is to a cathedral
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Dance music is like a virus: it has affected so many different genres
en_quotes.author: Avicii

en_quotes.quote: I have no love for myself as a human being, but I have immense pride in the music I make
en_quotes.author: Morrissey

en_quotes.quote: I got to know Elton John's older music by learning to like his newer stuff. 'The Lion King?' That's what I like
en_quotes.author: Aaron Schock

en_quotes.quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Soul music is about longevity and reaching and touching people on a human level - and that's never going to get lost
en_quotes.author: Jill Scott

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing stable in the world; uproar's your only music
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: Gospel music allows us to become closer to God and closer to each other
en_quotes.author: Marvin Sapp

en_quotes.quote: It's all about the flow and the beat. Rap is more than just music now
en_quotes.author: Playboi Carti

en_quotes.quote: I always make music as an art - it's never been a product for me
en_quotes.author: Lil Peep

en_quotes.quote: I love music. It's freedom, a way to deal with pent-up frustration
en_quotes.author: Ice Cube

en_quotes.quote: Music is the silence between the notes
en_quotes.author: Claude Debussy

en_quotes.quote: I think music is an instrument. It can create the initial thought patterns that can change the thinking of the people
en_quotes.author: John Coltrane

en_quotes.quote: For me, a paragraph in a novel is a bit like a line in a poem. It has its own shape, its own music, its own integrity
en_quotes.author: Paul Auster

en_quotes.quote: I want people to listen to my music all over the world and relate to it and feel it the way I feel it
en_quotes.author: NF

en_quotes.quote: I'm making music for the people. If y'all love the music, y'all gonna buy the music
en_quotes.author: The Notorious B.I.G.

en_quotes.quote: Versification is, indeed, indispensable for music, but rhyme, solely for rhyming's sake, most pernicious
en_quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

en_quotes.quote: If architecture is frozen music then music must be liquid architecture
en_quotes.author: Quincy Jones

en_quotes.quote: Live music is healthy
en_quotes.author: John Lydon

en_quotes.quote: When I am stressed, my No. 1 reliever is my music
en_quotes.author: Sabrina Bryan

en_quotes.quote: Rock music should be gross: that's the fun of it. It gets up and drops its trousers
en_quotes.author: Bruce Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: Dance music will always be around. People around the world love to dance
en_quotes.author: Kaskade

en_quotes.quote: I like being in a recording studio. I like watching a song go from the simplicity of the original music
en_quotes.author: Grace Slick

en_quotes.quote: Anything that gets to the more emotional and dark side of music, I always enjoy
en_quotes.author: El-P

en_quotes.quote: My music's like waiting for a bus. You wait a long time for one, then a whole heap of them come along
en_quotes.author: Roisin Murphy

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot of crappy music that people like, you know, all over the world, and Norway is definitely not an exception
en_quotes.author: Sondre Lerche

en_quotes.quote: This music won't do. There's not enough sarcasm in it
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: Who hears music feels his solitude peopled at once
en_quotes.author: Robert Browning

en_quotes.quote: Music, not sex, got me aroused
en_quotes.author: Marvin Gaye

en_quotes.quote: I am a classical music lover - not necessarily the contemporary stuff, but the old stuff
en_quotes.author: Eberhard Weber

en_quotes.quote: No good opera plot can be sensible, for people do not sing when they are feeling sensible
en_quotes.author: W. H. Auden

en_quotes.quote: Music is the best means we have of digesting time
en_quotes.author: W. H. Auden

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes words are just music themselves. Like 'Chicago' is a very musical sounding name
en_quotes.author: Tom Waits

en_quotes.quote: Writing about music is like dancing about architecture
en_quotes.author: Martin Mull

en_quotes.quote: Some of us get a feeling when we hear music and we feel music, and you want to figure out how to continue to feel that
en_quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

en_quotes.quote: I don't read music. I don't write it. So I wander around on the guitar until something starts to present itself
en_quotes.author: James Taylor

en_quotes.quote: They teach you there's a boundary line to music. But, man, there's no boundary line to art
en_quotes.author: Charlie Parker

en_quotes.quote: I did the marching band all throughout junior high and high school. Music was one of my favorite things in school
en_quotes.author: Tommy Lee

en_quotes.quote: My music is about being strong, even in your vulnerability
en_quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

en_quotes.quote: The world's most famous and popular language is music
en_quotes.author: Psy

en_quotes.quote: Soul music is pain - you can hear the slaves, the beatin' and the hurtin'
en_quotes.author: Link Wray

en_quotes.quote: Change is the only constant, whether it's in music, culture, dance or fashion
en_quotes.author: Sonu Nigam

en_quotes.quote: Music industry's a fragmented mess
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

en_quotes.quote: I don't care much about music. What I like is sounds
en_quotes.author: Dizzy Gillespie

en_quotes.quote: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart
en_quotes.author: Pablo Casals

en_quotes.quote: Music is life itself. What would this world be without good music? No matter what kind it is
en_quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: I love country music, but I also love gangster rap
en_quotes.author: Anderson East

en_quotes.quote: Yoga is almost like music in a way; there's no end to it
en_quotes.author: Sting

en_quotes.quote: I feel like good music comes and goes in waves
en_quotes.author: Santigold

en_quotes.quote: I'm trying to make music that I like, and I love hip-hop. At the same time, I love guitar. I love rock and everything
en_quotes.author: Post Malone

en_quotes.quote: I feel that when you care about your music, taking risks is something you should do to keep things exciting
en_quotes.author: Drake

en_quotes.quote: Music is the shorthand of emotion
en_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

en_quotes.quote: In music the passions enjoy themselves
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: Music is the arithmetic of sounds as optics is the geometry of light
en_quotes.author: Claude Debussy

en_quotes.quote: Musicians should not play music. Music should play musicians
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Old music is the same as new music - it's just a different way of delivering it
en_quotes.author: Jeff Lynne

en_quotes.quote: For me, music making is the most joyful activity possible, the most perfect expression of any emotion
en_quotes.author: Luciano Pavarotti

en_quotes.quote: I'm extremely happy with 'Maybach Music V.'
en_quotes.author: Rick Ross

en_quotes.quote: When I think of myself, I think of Toronto. My music would never sound the way it does if it weren't for Toronto
en_quotes.author: Drake

en_quotes.quote: Film is one of the three universal languages, the other two: mathematics and music
en_quotes.author: Frank Capra

en_quotes.quote: Classic rock, psychedelic rock - I like to dig up old music and see what I can get influenced by
en_quotes.author: Diplo

en_quotes.quote: I'm a DJ who makes dance music who got to play with Sting
en_quotes.author: Afrojack

en_quotes.quote: It is piracy, not overt online music stores, which is our main competitor
en_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

en_quotes.quote: We'd like to think that our music will always be bigger than any one of our individual personalities
en_quotes.author: Chester Bennington

en_quotes.quote: Good rock music always tends to be around
en_quotes.author: Dave Davies

en_quotes.quote: As an artist, I never want to be a moment. I want to be a legacy, and I want my music to touch people for years to come
en_quotes.author: Khalid

en_quotes.quote: Music is my life, it is a reflection of what I go through
en_quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

en_quotes.quote: Tunings are wonderfully inspiring, and it helps you to write music. If I'm stuck, you know, I change the tuning
en_quotes.author: Kaki King

en_quotes.quote: Hell is full of musical amateurs
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: I feel blessed and humbled that people have loved my music. Nothing would be possible without their acceptance
en_quotes.author: A. R. Rahman

en_quotes.quote: What's missing from pop music is danger
en_quotes.author: Prince

en_quotes.quote: I like music that's more offensive. I like it to sound like nails on a blackboard, get me wild
en_quotes.author: Iggy Pop

en_quotes.quote: Music is the social act of communication among people, a gesture of friendship, the strongest there is
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Arnold

en_quotes.quote: I've always expressed my love for fashion through my music
en_quotes.author: Lil' Kim

en_quotes.quote: When words leave off, music begins
en_quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

en_quotes.quote: I think you have to keep a childlike quality to play music or make a record
en_quotes.author: Beck

en_quotes.quote: I don't think I make dance music. It's not even 4/4. And it's slow
en_quotes.author: Flume

en_quotes.quote: If you're only a fan of the old music, that music's gonna wind up sounding even older
en_quotes.author: Johnny Van Zant

en_quotes.quote: I want to make my music and be a happy woman, a good wife, a good mom and one day hopefully have a child of my own
en_quotes.author: LeAnn Rimes

en_quotes.quote: I grew up listening to Hindi music, ghazals and all
en_quotes.author: Kubra Sait

en_quotes.quote: Wherever I go with my life, even the good times and the bad parts, only two people are with me: God and my music
en_quotes.author: Nate Dogg

en_quotes.quote: I don't have very sophisticated taste in music. I listen to a lot of folk music. I like reggae
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: My work is entertainment, and I look at what entertains people, whether it's a selfie video or a music video
en_quotes.author: Qandeel Baloch

en_quotes.quote: I think I'm probably gonna quit music
en_quotes.author: Justin Bieber

en_quotes.quote: Music is a thing that changes people's lives. It has the capacity to make young people's lives better
en_quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

en_quotes.quote: I think the most important thing about music is the sense of escape
en_quotes.author: Thom Yorke

en_quotes.quote: Music is my life, and if I like a song, chances are the world will also
en_quotes.author: Flo Rida

en_quotes.quote: To me, rap music is bigger than who's the coolest rapper, the biggest rapper. It's everything about your personality
en_quotes.author: Diplo

en_quotes.quote: Music is love in search of a word
en_quotes.author: Sidney Lanier

en_quotes.quote: I personally love electronic music specifically because it has the rhythm, the kick, the thump - it has energy
en_quotes.author: Bakermat

en_quotes.quote: Music, in performance, is a type of sculpture. The air in the performance is sculpted into something
en_quotes.author: Frank Zappa

en_quotes.quote: As I'm growing, so is my music
en_quotes.author: Shawn Mendes

en_quotes.quote: I've accomplished enough with the music that I haven't had to go out there and do other things to over-saturate
en_quotes.author: Eminem

en_quotes.quote: The music business is not a good place for people who don't know things
en_quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

en_quotes.quote: Music can change the world because it can change people
en_quotes.author: Bono

en_quotes.quote: If a composer could say what he had to say in words he would not bother trying to say it in music
en_quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

en_quotes.quote: For me, there is no day or night for music. I often work through the night - without phone calls disturbing me
en_quotes.author: A. R. Rahman

en_quotes.quote: Music is forever; music should grow and mature with you, following you right on up until you die
en_quotes.author: Paul Simon

en_quotes.quote: I want to grow as an artist, and I'm taking a step out. I want my music to mature
en_quotes.author: Justin Bieber

en_quotes.quote: Delhiites are mind-blowing. Their enthusiasm and fervour pumps me up to give my best shot. They value my music
en_quotes.author: Guru Randhawa

en_quotes.quote: I frequently hear music in the very heart of noise
en_quotes.author: George Gershwin

en_quotes.quote: Music is to give, share
en_quotes.author: Sam Smith

en_quotes.quote: I realize that I'm not going to be everybody's cup of tea, and that's okay. I think that's the point of music
en_quotes.author: Kacey Musgraves

en_quotes.quote: I do listen to other music though, and try to pick up what is good
en_quotes.author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan

en_quotes.quote: Music and silence combine strongly because music is done with silence, and silence is full of music
en_quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

en_quotes.quote: Jazz is a white term to define black people. My music is black classical music
en_quotes.author: Nina Simone

en_quotes.quote: It was Elvis who really got me hooked on beat music. When I heard 'Heartbreak Hotel' I thought, this is it
en_quotes.author: Paul McCartney

en_quotes.quote: Music is a safe kind of high
en_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

en_quotes.quote: There is a real patriotism underneath the best of my music but it is a critical, questioning and often angry patriotism
en_quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

en_quotes.quote: Live music is better
en_quotes.author: Neil Young

en_quotes.quote: The great moments of rock 'n' roll were never off in some corner of the music world, in a self-constructed ghetto
en_quotes.author: Bono

en_quotes.quote: The real art of conducting consists in transitions
en_quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

en_quotes.quote: Music and physical activity goes hand in hand. Music and basketball, man
en_quotes.author: Prodigy

en_quotes.quote: The wise musicians are those who play what they can master
en_quotes.author: Duke Ellington

en_quotes.quote: I just want to make the best music of all time with my best friends
en_quotes.author: Chris Martin

en_quotes.quote: Will.i.am and I performed at Wango Tango. That's when my daughter said that I had made it in music
en_quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

en_quotes.quote: Music should be your escape
en_quotes.author: Missy Elliott

en_quotes.quote: I've never believed that pop music is escapist trash. There's always a darkness in it, even amidst great pop music
en_quotes.author: Thom Yorke

en_quotes.quote: I would never have been able to find my voice if I didn't have music education
en_quotes.author: Khalid

en_quotes.quote: I love slow music
en_quotes.author: Norah Jones

en_quotes.quote: I never expected to make a lot of money from music
en_quotes.author: Flume

en_quotes.quote: In 'thinking up' music I usually have some kind of a brass band with wings on it in back of my mind
en_quotes.author: Charles Ives

en_quotes.quote: Ever since Two Daughters I've been composing my own music
en_quotes.author: Satyajit Ray

en_quotes.quote: Music's another big love of mine
en_quotes.author: Thomas Brodie-Sangster

en_quotes.quote: The one thing I wanted to do more than anything else was sing country music
en_quotes.author: Patsy Cline

en_quotes.quote: I'm attached to the beat. The beat speaks words. I love music
en_quotes.author: Travis Scott

en_quotes.quote: People who make music together cannot be enemies, at least while the music lasts
en_quotes.author: Paul Hindemith

en_quotes.quote: The only love affair I have ever had was with music
en_quotes.author: Maurice Ravel

en_quotes.quote: I must be true to myself within my music or I would be a liar
en_quotes.author: Nneka

en_quotes.quote: I listen to a lot of music... but there still hasn't been a project yet that touches me like 'Beast Mode' has
en_quotes.author: Zaytoven

en_quotes.quote: Everywhere in the world, music enhances a hall, with one exception: Carnegie Hall enhances the music
en_quotes.author: Isaac Stern

en_quotes.quote: Music can be made anywhere, is invisible and does not smell
en_quotes.author: W. H. Auden

en_quotes.quote: Like music and art, love of nature is a common language that can transcend political or social boundaries
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

en_quotes.quote: I need drama in my life to keep making music
en_quotes.author: Eminem

en_quotes.quote: I don't make music for Christians. I make music for everyone. I make music for the masses
en_quotes.author: NF

en_quotes.quote: I love to play music. So why endanger that with something like drugs?
en_quotes.author: Dave Grohl

en_quotes.quote: True country music is honesty, sincerity, and real life to the hilt
en_quotes.author: Garth Brooks

en_quotes.quote: He has Van Gogh's ear for music
en_quotes.author: Billy Wilder

en_quotes.quote: The desire to hit a big home run is dominating the music business
en_quotes.author: Billy Corgan

en_quotes.quote: Music has charms to sooth a savage breast, to soften rocks, or bend a knotted oak
en_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: I know what I've done for music, but don't call me a legend. Just call me Miles Davis
en_quotes.author: Miles Davis

en_quotes.quote: I found The Doors, and thank God I found The Doors because it inspired me to do Strange Music, and it saved my life
en_quotes.author: Tech N9ne

en_quotes.quote: Music is my life, professionally, for nearly 60 years. To be recognized by the academy is still the highest honor
en_quotes.author: Ray Charles

en_quotes.quote: Festival line-ups should have all types of music. It's part of cultural growth
en_quotes.author: Sigrid

en_quotes.quote: Why should be elite, music? Excuse me. Music must be for everybody
en_quotes.author: Luciano Pavarotti

en_quotes.quote: If you want to make beautiful music, you must play the black and the white notes together
en_quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

en_quotes.quote: Learning a play is one thing, but to learn to play Vivaldi's 'Four Seasons' without music: that's brilliant
en_quotes.author: Roger Moore

en_quotes.quote: I have no idea about the state of rap. I don't pay attention. I just listen to old music that I have
en_quotes.author: Ad-Rock

en_quotes.quote: The Smiths was an incredibly personal thing to me. It was like launching your own diary to music
en_quotes.author: Morrissey

en_quotes.quote: With a good melody... music gets me through everything
en_quotes.author: Drake Bell

en_quotes.quote: Everyone should pursue whatever is original in oneself. That's the way for a long life in music
en_quotes.author: Bjorn Ulvaeus

en_quotes.quote: Well, because music is my life and music is not work for me
en_quotes.author: Gunther Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Music is like a medicine
en_quotes.author: Stromae

en_quotes.quote: People love gospel music. It's calming. It's soothing. It gets right to the point of whatever you're dealing with
en_quotes.author: Yolanda Adams

en_quotes.quote: Listening to the Beatles' music figures into pretty much all of my childhood memories
en_quotes.author: Lee Ranaldo

en_quotes.quote: I'll never quit playing country music, or at least acknowledging it, always, as the cornerstone of what I am
en_quotes.author: Dwight Yoakam

en_quotes.quote: I love gentle, gorgeous classical music such as Mozart
en_quotes.author: Felicity Kendal

en_quotes.quote: I want to write my own music, and I want to tour
en_quotes.author: Cole Vosbury

en_quotes.quote: Music is everybody's possession. It's only publishers who think that people own it
en_quotes.author: John Lennon

en_quotes.quote: The music of Hendrix wakes people up to their possibilities. It's more than just dreaming about being a guitar hero
en_quotes.author: Carlos Santana

en_quotes.quote: Music is nothing else but wild sounds civilized into time and tune
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: I don't know anything about music. In my line you don't have to
en_quotes.author: Elvis Presley

en_quotes.quote: Music is well said to be the speech of angels
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: If you look deep enough you will see music; the heart of nature being everywhere music
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: I just like music, bro. I listen to everyone
en_quotes.author: YG

en_quotes.quote: I've always been involved in music. Whether it be taking piano lessons or something, I always have
en_quotes.author: Juice Wrld

en_quotes.quote: I spend all my time right now trying to combat music retail and copyright
en_quotes.author: Garth Brooks

en_quotes.quote: I only wear vintage clothing. I'm pretty obsessed with things in the '60s, like fashion and music, too
en_quotes.author: Melanie Martinez

en_quotes.quote: I was always struck by how Picasso had no interest in music
en_quotes.author: David Hockney

en_quotes.quote: Music when healthy, is the teacher of perfect order, and when depraved, the teacher of perfect disorder
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: I work hard making music - that's how I earn a living
en_quotes.author: Dr. Dre

en_quotes.quote: My music had roots which I'd dug up from my own childhood, musical roots buried in the darkest soil
en_quotes.author: Ray Charles

en_quotes.quote: That's why people come to live music, right? To see something go wrong, something human, something vulnerable
en_quotes.author: Maggie Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Music is my breath, blood and food - without music I would perish; the actor in me would die
en_quotes.author: Dhanush

en_quotes.quote: Music happens to be an art form that transcends language
en_quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

en_quotes.quote: I love bluegrass music, I love acoustic music, and I try at the right times to push that a little bit
en_quotes.author: Dierks Bentley

en_quotes.quote: When I first started to do music, I was kind of doing what I thought people would want me to do
en_quotes.author: Lil Nas X

en_quotes.quote: The people who know nothing about music are the ones always talking about it
en_quotes.author: Nat King Cole

en_quotes.quote: Music comes from a place we don't know
en_quotes.author: Chris Martin

en_quotes.quote: I'm in a very good place to make records. Needing to make money off music is very dangerous
en_quotes.author: Ice T

en_quotes.quote: Nothing goes full-circle with music
en_quotes.author: Deadmau5

en_quotes.quote: I think my music has connected with the audience because I always have a clear vision about my songs
en_quotes.author: Ozuna

en_quotes.quote: Pop is actually my least favorite kind of music, because it lacks real depth
en_quotes.author: Christina Aguilera

en_quotes.quote: In New Orleans, music is part of the culture. You're raised with it, from the cradle to the grave, and all in-between
en_quotes.author: Aaron Neville

en_quotes.quote: When it comes down to music, I have no balance. I am 100 percent. It is like full throttle. Five hundred miles an hour
en_quotes.author: Yanni

en_quotes.quote: Music and fashion complement one another when combined
en_quotes.author: Jungkook

en_quotes.quote: Music is something that should speak for itself, straight from the heart. It took me a long time to understand that
en_quotes.author: Damon Albarn

en_quotes.quote: No, I don't regret my decision at all, especially after I started this music career. My eyes were as big as saucers
en_quotes.author: Johnny Mathis

en_quotes.quote: I wanted people to say that our music sounds like Porcupine Tree, not that it sounds like King Crimson
en_quotes.author: Steven Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Music is only love looking for words
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

en_quotes.quote: I always felt a love for music, but I never got my nerve up enough to try a musical instrument in school
en_quotes.author: Don Cornelius

en_quotes.quote: At a music hall, I'll get upset if someone coughs or if someone's cellphone goes off
en_quotes.author: Joshua Bell

en_quotes.quote: The religious lifestyle keeps you focused. It's helpful when trying to manoeuvre through the music scene
en_quotes.author: Matisyahu

en_quotes.quote: Placebo is music for outsiders, by outsiders and our gigs are like conventions of outcasts, which is cool
en_quotes.author: Brian Molko

en_quotes.quote: My music, my whole approach to the synthesizer has completely changed now
en_quotes.author: John Frusciante

en_quotes.quote: Anybody who thinks pop music's easy should try to make a pop single and find out that it isn't
en_quotes.author: Robert Wyatt

en_quotes.quote: In the music business, if you're not a fighter, you will get walked all over
en_quotes.author: Tina Knowles

en_quotes.quote: I am really addicted to music
en_quotes.author: Gavin Rossdale

en_quotes.quote: I have a classical music background. I studied violin and trumpet
en_quotes.author: Johnny Flynn

en_quotes.quote: I'm an underdog by nature, and I like to be fighting. I don't make music for myself. I make music to fight
en_quotes.author: James Murphy

en_quotes.quote: Music creates a certain mood and then people dress accordingly. I think it's all quite closely intertwined
en_quotes.author: Georgia May Jagger

en_quotes.quote: There's nothing like music to relieve the soul and uplift it
en_quotes.author: Mickey Hart

en_quotes.quote: I've always been involved in the visual arts and music
en_quotes.author: Adam Jones

en_quotes.quote: Music is my release
en_quotes.author: Ed Westwick

en_quotes.quote: You can never get silence anywhere nowadays, have you noticed?
en_quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

en_quotes.quote: It's a particular skill, I think, doing backing vocals. You're blending the vocals between the gaps, between the music
en_quotes.author: Lisa Hannigan

en_quotes.quote: I've never missed a gig yet. Music makes people happy, and that's why I go on doing it - I like to see everybody smile
en_quotes.author: Buddy Guy

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes music can really seem like a popularity contest with beautiful people
en_quotes.author: Tom Walker

en_quotes.quote: If it's got the feeling, if the music moves you or not, it doesn't matter what the genre is to me
en_quotes.author: Casey James

en_quotes.quote: I'm really excited to put music out that is a clear projection of my lifestyle
en_quotes.author: Miguel

en_quotes.quote: I admire how Tarantino finds music that's semifamiliar and not famous: undiscovered gems
en_quotes.author: Rod Lurie

en_quotes.quote: I guess a good song is a good song is a good song, ya know
en_quotes.author: George Thorogood

en_quotes.quote: For me, one I love the 80's, I love 80's music, I'm sort of a baby of the 80's, I grew up in the 80s
en_quotes.author: Will Estes

en_quotes.quote: Myspace was always a bit edgy. People identified it with edginess and music
en_quotes.author: Michael Birch

en_quotes.quote: Composers shouldn't think too much - it interferes with their plagiarism
en_quotes.author: Howard Dietz

en_quotes.quote: Once I get into the locker room, I turn on stuff to get me hyped up. Mainly, it's a lot of rap music
en_quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

en_quotes.quote: Music is the strongest form of magic
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

en_quotes.quote: Music is my passion - it's what I love and it's in my blood. You can never take me away from my work
en_quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

en_quotes.quote: Please write music like Wagner, only louder
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: In its beginnings, music was merely chamber music, meant to be listened to in a small space by a small audience
en_quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

en_quotes.quote: I just want to get my music out and make sure that it's heard in the right way
en_quotes.author: Dr. Dre

en_quotes.quote: I see music as fluid architecture
en_quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: The iPod completely changed the way people approach music
en_quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

en_quotes.quote: You can't stay the same. If you're a musician and a singer, you have to change, that's the way it works
en_quotes.author: Van Morrison

en_quotes.quote: True music must repeat the thought and inspirations of the people and the time
en_quotes.author: George Gershwin

en_quotes.quote: Classical music is the kind we keep thinking will turn into a tune
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Music is the fourth great material want, first food, then clothes, then shelter, then music
en_quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

en_quotes.quote: I think often sadness is a great place to get songs from
en_quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

en_quotes.quote: I look at you and I write down what I hear
en_quotes.author: Virgil Thomson

en_quotes.quote: I don't make music for eyes. I make music for ears
en_quotes.author: Adele

en_quotes.quote: Music is very spiritual, it has the power to bring people together
en_quotes.author: Edgar Winter

en_quotes.quote: All music is beautiful
en_quotes.author: Billy Strayhorn

en_quotes.quote: Music is intended and designed for sentient beings that have hopes and purposes and emotions
en_quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

en_quotes.quote: Long intros are cool because there's a little bit of anticipation, you know?
en_quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

en_quotes.quote: I was growing up listening to Queen. Freddie Mercury threw those incredible melodies into his songs
en_quotes.author: Gary Cherone

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes before we make a record I go back and listen to a few. It's equally humbling and uplifting
en_quotes.author: Michael Stipe

en_quotes.quote: We all love musical architecture; there's no doubt about that
en_quotes.author: Levon Helm

en_quotes.quote: As a solo artist, my desire is to express myself through my music
en_quotes.author: Jessica Jung

en_quotes.quote: There's nothing like a good cheating song to make me want to run home to be with my wife
en_quotes.author: Steven Curtis Chapman

en_quotes.quote: Music is always changing and the changes are unpredictable
en_quotes.author: Billy Sheehan

en_quotes.quote: My father used to sing to me in my mother's womb. I think I can name about any tune in two beats
en_quotes.author: Yancy Butler

en_quotes.quote: Secretly, I wanted to look like Jimi Hendrix, but I could never quite pull it off
en_quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

en_quotes.quote: But when you get music and words together, that can be a very powerful thing
en_quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

en_quotes.quote: Maine is a movable music festival in the summertime
en_quotes.author: Sue Hubbell

en_quotes.quote: Music is the soundtrack of your life
en_quotes.author: Dick Clark

en_quotes.quote: You know, all my songs are relatives, brothers, sisters, cousins
en_quotes.author: David Coverdale

en_quotes.quote: Music's staying power is a function of how timeless the lyrics, song and production are
en_quotes.author: Gary Wright

en_quotes.quote: I wake up in the morning, I do a little stretching exercises, pick up the horn and play
en_quotes.author: Herb Alpert

en_quotes.quote: That was when I realised that music is the most profound, magical form of communication there is
en_quotes.author: Lesley Garrett

en_quotes.quote: I don't think I have ever met a single person who isn't moved by music of some kind
en_quotes.author: Lesley Garrett

en_quotes.quote: Music is a performance and needs the audience
en_quotes.author: Michael Tippett

en_quotes.quote: Any good music must be an innovation
en_quotes.author: Les Baxter

en_quotes.quote: My music, my songs are 100 percent inspired by girl power
en_quotes.author: Paulina Rubio

en_quotes.quote: Music's not like becoming a doctor, who can walk into a community and find people who need him
en_quotes.author: Charlie Byrd
